comparisonMethodHelp.message: Equals/Not equals: Exact match or regex pattern matching. Greater than/Less than: Numeric comparison if possible, otherwise string comparison.

selectPatternHelp.message: Tens place: Custom type (1=native, 2=custom, 3=jquery), Hundreds place: Multiple selection (0=single, 1=multiple)

eventPatternHelp.message: Basic: Simple event dispatching. Framework-agnostic: Compatible with React/Vue/jQuery (recommended, default)

screenshotQualityHelp.message: Higher quality values result in larger file sizes. 100=High, 80=Medium (recommended), 60=Low

getValuePatternHelp.message: Specify how to retrieve the value from the element. 10=value attribute (form elements), 20=textContent (text content), 30=innerText (visible text), 40=innerHTML (HTML content), 50=data-* attribute (custom data)

syncConfigLoadFailed.message: Failed to load sync configurations. There may be an issue accessing Chrome Storage. Please restart your browser and try again.
syncConfigLoadFailed.description: Failed to load configs detailed message

syncConfigLoadError.message: An unexpected error occurred while loading sync configurations. Please refresh the page and try again. If the problem persists, consider reinstalling the Chrome extension.

syncConfigCreateFailed.message: Failed to create sync configuration. Please check your input and ensure all required fields are filled in.

syncConfigUpdateFailed.message: Failed to update sync configuration. Please check that the configuration ID is correct and that the input is valid.

syncConfigDeleteFailed.message: Failed to delete sync configuration. Please check that the configuration ID is correct and hasn't already been deleted.

syncConfigGetFailed.message: Failed to retrieve sync configuration. Please check that the configuration ID is correct and hasn't been deleted.

syncConfigExportFailed.message: CSV export failed. Please check that the storage key is correct and that data exists.

syncConfigImportFailed.message: CSV import failed. Please check that the CSV file format is correct and that the data is valid.

syncConfigImportedWithMerge.message: Imported $1 items and merged with $2 existing items
syncConfigImportedWithMerge.description: CSV import with merge success message

syncConfigValidationError.message: An unexpected error occurred during configuration validation. Please check your configuration and try again.

syncConfigConnectionFailedDetail.message: Connection failed: $1. Please check your credentials and network connection.

syncConfigConnectionTestError.message: An unexpected error occurred during connection test. Please check your credentials (API Key, Access Token, etc.) and try again.

syncConfigHistoriesLoadFailed.message: Failed to load sync histories. There may be an issue accessing Chrome Storage.

syncConfigHistoriesLoadError.message: An unexpected error occurred while loading sync histories. Please refresh the page and try again.

syncConfigHistoryNotFound.message: The specified history was not found. It may have already been deleted.

syncConfigHistoryDetailLoadError.message: An unexpected error occurred while loading history details. Please refresh the page and try again.

syncConfigCleanupFailed.message: Failed to cleanup histories. Please check the number of days specified.

syncConfigCleanupError.message: An unexpected error occurred during history cleanup. Please refresh the page and try again.

Local and remote ($1) data differ.
Please choose which data to use.

conflictRecommendationEqual.message: ⚖️ Timestamps are equal. Please check the data content.

conflictRecommendationInvalid.message: ⚠️ Cannot provide recommendation due to invalid timestamps.

dataSyncSettingsDescription.message: Configure sync method, timing, and direction for each storage key. Choose between DB sync (Notion/Google Sheets) or CSV file sync.
